verses.plain: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.

tokens.t: Bless the
, O my soul. O
my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.

verses.plain: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:

tokens.t: Who coverest
with light as
a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:

verses.plain: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:

tokens.t: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:

verses.plain: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:

tokens.t: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:

verses.plain: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.

tokens.t: laid the foundations of the earth,
it should not be removed for ever.

verses.plain: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.

tokens.t: Thou coveredst it with the deep as
a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.

verses.plain: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.

tokens.t: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.

verses.plain: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.

tokens.t: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.

verses.plain: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.

tokens.t: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.

verses.plain: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.

tokens.t: He sendeth the springs into the valleys,
run among the hills.

verses.plain: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.

tokens.t: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.

verses.plain: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.

tokens.t: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation,
sing among the branches.

verses.plain: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.

tokens.t: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.

verses.plain: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;

tokens.t: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;

verses.plain: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man’s heart.

tokens.t: And wine
maketh glad the heart of man,
oil to make
face to shine, and bread
strengtheneth man’s heart.

verses.plain: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;

tokens.t: The trees of the
are full
the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;

verses.plain: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.

tokens.t: Where the birds make their nests:
the stork, the fir trees
her house.

verses.plain: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.

tokens.t: The high hills
a refuge for the wild goats;
the rocks for the conies.

verses.plain: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.

tokens.t: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.

verses.plain: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.

tokens.t: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep

verses.plain: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.

tokens.t: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.

verses.plain: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.

tokens.t: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.

verses.plain: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.

tokens.t: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.

verses.plain: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.

tokens.t: O
, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.

verses.plain: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.

tokens.t: this great and wide sea, wherein
things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.

verses.plain: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.

tokens.t: There go the ships:
that leviathan,
thou hast made to play therein.

verses.plain: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.

tokens.t: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give
their meat in due season.

verses.plain: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.

tokens.t: thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.

verses.plain: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.

tokens.t: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.

verses.plain: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.

tokens.t: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.

verses.plain: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.

tokens.t: The glory of the
shall endure for ever: the
shall rejoice in his works.

verses.plain: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.

tokens.t: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.

verses.plain: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.

tokens.t: I will sing unto the
as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.

verses.plain: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.

tokens.t: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the

verses.plain: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.

tokens.t: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the
, O my soul. Praise ye the

footnotes.text: Who…: Heb. He hath founded the earth upon her bases
They go up…: or, The mountains ascend, the valleys descend
oil…: Heb. to make his face shine with oil, or, more than oil
beasts…: Heb. beasts thereof do trample on the forest
